data: Complex Graph Learning from Earnings Call Transcript Data
Two-mechanism approach integrating spatial relationships with stock dynamics
Modeling dynamic relationships via data entropy
Multi-relationship diffusion process with parallel preservation
Consistently superior performance in NASDAQ, NYSE, and Shanghai markets (2016-2023)
Two-stage noise reduction framework with spatially aware attention mechanism
Iterative improved labeling for noise reduction
Accuracy: 59.1% Improved win-loss ratio in volatile markets
Integratable and adaptable sentiment fusion for prediction
Self-reflective LLM framework for autonomous learning
Superior performance in both prediction and explanation quality
